messages.ssml: <speak>The virus enters your body through your eyes, nose and/or mouth, so it is important to avoid touching your face with unwashed hands. Wash hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. It is also recommended to practice social distancing by staying 6 feet or more away from other people.</speak>

messages.displayText: The virus enters your body through your eyes, nose and/or mouth, so it is important to avoid touching your face with unwashed hands. Wash hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. It is also recommended to practice social distancing by staying 6 feet or more away from other people.

messages.formattedText: CDC's recommended steps to prevent illness

messages.speech: The virus enters your body through your eyes, nose and/or mouth, so it is important to avoid touching your face with unwashed hands. Wash hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. It is also recommended to practice social distancing by staying 6 feet or more away from other people.
